channel.title: CVE Feed for VeronaLabs -- WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VeronaLabs -- WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc

item.title: CVE-2023-27447|2024-08-02T12:09:43.593Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms%20%E2%80%93%20messaging%20%26%20sms%20notification%20for%20wordpress%2C%20woocommerce%2C%20gravityforms%2C%20etc
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc.This issue affects WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc: from n/a through 6.0.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-24881|2024-06-04T17:42:57.461Z -- veronalabs -- wp%20sms%20%E2%80%93%20messaging%20%26%20sms%20notification%20for%20wordpress%2C%20woocommerce%2C%20gravityforms%2C%20etc
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in VeronaLabs WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects WP SMS – Messaging & SMS Notification for WordPress, WooCommerce, GravityForms, etc: from n/a through 6.5.2.
